10570: 滚开滚开滚开~又一只，搞定！
どけどけどけ～！また1体やっつけた！
Move, move, move~! I've killed another one!
Roll away roll away roll away~ Another one, done!
Move, move, move~! I killed another one!
死士居然聚集在这……的确，这一带是崩坏能量数值最杂乱的区域，看来被我找到了。
ゾンビが集まってる……確かにこの一帯は崩壊エネルギーの数値が最も乱れているエリアね。どうやら見つけたみたい。
좀비들이 모여 있어…… 확실히 이 일대는 붕괴 에너지 수치가 가장 불안정한 구역이네. 이제 찾은 것 같아.
Zombies are gathering... This area is definitely the area with the most disorganized Honkai Energy values. It seems I've found it.
The dead soldiers actually gathered here ...... Indeed, this area is the area with the most disorganized values of disintegration energy, and it seems that I have found it.
Zombies are gathering. ...... This is certainly the area where the decay energy numbers are most disturbed. Looks like we found it.
报告，这里是琪亚娜，我已经发现——
報告、こちらキアナ、見つけたわ——
Reporting, this is Kiana, I found——
Report, this is Kiana. I've found--
Report, this is Kiana, we found--
もしもし、聞こえる？もしもし——
Hello? Can you hear me? Hellooo——
Hello? Can you hear me? Hello--
Hello, can you hear me? Hello, can you--
信号这么差，这也是受到崩坏的影响么？
どうしてこんなに電波が悪いの？これも崩壊の影響？
왜 이렇게 전파가 안 잡히지? 이것도 붕괴의 영향?
Why is the signal so bad? Is this also affected by the Honkai?
The signal is so bad, is this also affected by the crash?
Why is the signal so bad? Is this another effect of the collapse?
没差，区区崩坏诞生的死士，对于我琪亚娜来说，简直是小意思。
フンッ、たかが崩壊から生まれたゾンビでしょ。このキアナにとってはお茶の子さいさいよ。
흥, 겨우 붕괴에서 나온 좀비잖아. 이 키아나에게는 식은 죽 먹기야.
Hmph, it's just zombies born from the Honkai. They're a piece of cake for the great Kiana.
No matter, a mere crash-born Deadman is nothing to me, Kiana.
Hmmm, it's just a zombie born from decay. It's a little too much for this Kiana.
さっさと片付けてやるんだから！
Let's get this over with, fast!
Let's do it in three or two!
We're going to get it over with quickly!
10571: こいつらじゃ相手にならないわ！

쿠쿨칸! 왜 저 녀석이 아직 살아있는 거야!?
Kukulkan! How is that guy still alive?!
It's Kukulkan, why is this guy still alive!
Kukulkan! How is that guy still alive!
它看起来很虚弱，现在或许是消灭它的好机会。
かなり弱っているみたい。今があいつを倒すチャンスかも。
꽤 약해진 모양이야. 지금이 저 녀석을 쓰러뜨릴 찬스일지도.
He seems pretty weak. Now might be the chance to take him down.
It looks weak, and now might be a good time to destroy it.
He seems to be very weak. Now may be our chance to defeat him.
No good, you wait for me!
I won't let you get away!
We won't let them get away!
10572: キアナ、早く目を覚ましなさい！
それ以上寝てたらアイスキャンディーになっちゃうわよ。
계속 자면 아이스캔디 되어 버릴 거야.
If you sleep any longer you'll turn into a popsicle.
Go back to sleep and you'll turn into a popsicle.
If you sleep any longer you'll turn into a popsicle.
啊对，通讯器，通讯器——找到了。
あっ、そうだ。通信機、通信機——あった。
Ah, right. My communicator, where's my communicator — there it is.
Ah yes, the communicator, the communicator - found it.
Oh, yes. A communicator, a communicator - there it is.
不是撞到头了吧，怎么呆呆的。
頭をぶつけたの？なんだかボーッとしてるみたいだけど。
머리를 부딪혔어? 좀 멍한 것 같은데.
Did you hit your head? You seem a bit dazed.
You didn't hit your head, did you? Why are you dumb.
Did you bump your head? You seem kind of spaced out.
你这表现很难说明自己没事啊。
その様子だと、とても大丈夫とは思えないわね。
그 꼴을 보니, 절대 괜찮아 보이진 않네.
Your behavior right now is making hard to believe you're really alright.
It's hard to tell you're okay when you're acting like this.
By the looks of it, I don't think you're doing very well.
どうして信じてくれないの……。
琪亚娜·卡斯兰娜，是对崩坏特化部队“女武神”的一员。
キアナ・カスラナ、対崩壊特化部隊「戦乙女(ヴァルキリー)」の一員よ。
I'm Kiana Kaslana, a member of an anti-Honkai specialized unit of "Valkyries".
Kiana Kaslana is a member of the "Valkyries", a specialization unit for the Avalanche.
Kiana Kasrana, a member of the Valkyrie, a specialized anti-disintegration unit.
そこは強調しなくていいでしょ！
There's no need to mention that part!
This doesn't need to be emphasized!
You don't need to emphasize that part!
好啦好啦，看你还有精神顶嘴，确实没什么问题。
はいはい。口答えする元気があるなら、たしかに大丈夫みたいね。
알았어 알았어. 말대꾸할 힘이 있다면, 확실히 괜찮은 모양이네.
Yeah, yeah. If you have the nerve to argue back, then it seems like you're okay.
Well, well, well, seeing as you still have the spirit to talk back, there's really nothing wrong with it.
Yes, yes, yes. If you have the energy to talk back, you certainly seem to be doing okay.
这四周，看起来像一个冰窟窿。
ここは……氷の洞窟みたい。
This place... looks like an ice cave.
All around here, it looks like an ice hole.
This place looks like an ...... ice cave.
昨晚，因为这一带雪山区域检测到了不稳定崩坏能反应。
昨日の夜、この一帯の雪山で不安定な崩壊エネルギー反応を検出したんだった。
어제 밤에 이 일대의 설산에서 불안정한 붕괴 에너지 반응을 감지했었지.
Last night, we detected an unstable Honkai Energy signal in the snowy mountains here.
Last night, as an unstable collapse energy response was detected in this area of the snowy mountains.
I had detected an unstable decay energy reaction in the snowy mountains in this area last night.
于是，我和我的老师时雨绮罗接受了任务，来到这里调查。
そこで、私と私の先生である時雨綺羅は任務を受けて調査に来て——
그래서 나와 나의 스승인 시구레 키라가 임무를 받고 조사하러 와서——
So, my teacher, Shigure Kira and I were tasked with investigating—
So, my teacher, Tokoyu Eero, and I accepted the mission and came here to investigate.
So, me and my teacher, Shigure Kira, were tasked to come and investigate--
然后在分开搜索时，我碰到了巨大的崩坏兽，被它引发的雪崩带到了这里。
手分けして捜索していた私は、巨大な崩壊獣に遭遇し、そいつが起こした雪崩に呑み込まれてここまで落ちてきた。
손을 나눠 수색하던 중, 나는 거대한 붕괴수와 마주쳤고, 그 녀석이 일으킨 눈사태에 휩쓸려 여기까지 떨어졌어.
As we split up and searched, I encountered a giant Honkai Beast, and was swallowed up by the avalanche it caused, which brought me down here.
Then while searching separately, I ran into the giant crumbling beast and was brought here by the avalanche it triggered.
As we split up to search, I encountered a huge Honkai Beast and was swallowed by the avalanche it caused and fell to this point.
綺羅姉さんに知られるなんて……恥ずかしい。
It's ...... embarrassing for Kira's sister to know.
就当做是宝贵的经验吧。
貴重な経験をしたと思いなさい。
现在，我们要先汇合，我发送你坐标，能过来吗？
まずは合流しましょう。私の座標を送るけど、こっちに来られる？
일단 합류하자. 내 좌표를 보낼 테니, 이쪽으로 올 수 있어?
Let's meet up first. I'll send you my coordinates. Can you come over here?
Now, we have to rendezvous first. I'm sending you the coordinates. Can you come over?
Let's meet up first. I'll send you my coordinates, can you come this way?
不应该绮罗姐你派救援过来嘛！
綺羅姉さんが救援を送るべきでしょ！
키라 언니가 구원을 보내야 하는 거 아니야!
Why don't you just send reinforcements, Kira?!
I don't think you should have sent help!
You should send Kira's sister to the rescue!
这不看你没什么大碍，能自己走回来。
そう？あなたは大丈夫そうだし、自分で歩いて戻って来られるでしょう？
그래? 너는 괜찮아 보이는데, 혼자 걸어서 돌아올 수 있지 않아?
Really? But you seem okay and can walk back by yourself, right?
It doesn't look like you're in any serious condition to walk back on your own.
Yeah? You seem fine and can walk back on your own, right?
行啦，我也知道你临时指挥部那边有很多事要做。
……分かった。綺羅姉さんは臨時指揮本部でやるべきことがたくさんあるのも知ってるしね。
……알겠어. 키라 누나도 임시 지휘본부에서 할 일이 많은 거 알고 있으니까.
...Fine. I know there's a lot to do at the temporary command center, Kira.
Come on, I know you've got a lot on your plate over at the temporary command.
I understand ....... And I know that Kira's sister has a lot of work to do at the temporary command headquarters.
那家伙还活着，你一定要定位到它。
あいつまだ生きてるから、なんとしても居場所を見つけ出して。
저 녀석 아직 살아있으니까, 어떻게든 위치를 찾아내야 해.
That guy is still alive, so find out where he is no matter what.
That guy's still alive. You've got to locate it.
That guy is still alive, so do whatever you can to find a place for him.
保持通讯，但具体情况，汇合再进行同步。
でも、通信は保ち続けて。具体的な状況は合流してから共有するわ。
하지만, 통신은 계속 유지해. 구체적인 상황은 합류한 후에 공유할게.
But keep your communicator on. I'll share the specifics once we're together.
Maintain communication, but for specific situations, rendezvous and then synchronize.
But keep the communication alive. I'll share specifics of the situation when we meet up.
唉……也不知道身上的武器被卷到哪去了。
はぁ……持ってきた武器もどこかに飛ばされちゃった。
하아…… 가져온 무기도 어디론가 날아가 버렸네.
Sigh... The weapons I brought with me were blown away somewhere.
Lol ...... also don't know where the weapon on the body was rolled to.
Huh, the weapon I brought to ...... has been sent somewhere too.
但只用这些，也不成问题。
でも、これだけあれば問題ないわ。
But if I at least have these, it'll be fine.
But with just those, it's not a problem.
But all this wouldn't be a problem.
手边只有一些随着雪崩被带到山洞里的简陋枪械。
手元には、雪崩によって洞窟に流れついた簡素な銃がいくつかあった。
손엔 눈사태로 동굴에 밀려온 간단한 총 몇 정이 있었다.
In hand were some basic guns that had been washed into the cave by the avalanche.
All that was at hand were some rudimentary firearms that had been brought into the cave with the avalanche.
In hand were several simple guns that had been washed into the cave by the avalanche.
因为谁在这死于崩坏，你们才会被留下。
これは……崩壊のせいで死んだ人の物かな。
These... must belong to someone who died from the Honkai.
For whoever dies here in the crash, you will be left behind.
I wonder if this belongs to someone who died because of the ...... collapse.
クソッ、早くここから抜け出さないと。
Shit, I need to hurry out of here.
Damn it, let's get out of here first.
Damn, we need to get out of here.

붕괴의 폭발로 생긴 붕괴 에너지도 약해진 걸까.

以前、私と綺羅姉さんが仕留めきれなかったあの崩壊獣は一体どこに行ったの？
이전에, 나와 기라 언니가 끝내지 못했던 저 붕괴수는 대체 어디로 간 거지?
Where the hell did that Honkai Beast that Kira and I couldn't kill go?
Once upon a time, where did the crumbling beast that Eero-san and I didn't completely destroy go?
Where the hell is that Honkai Beast that Kira and I couldn't finish off before?

もし街へ向かっていたら——

If it goes to the city--

msg
不对，那样不可能发现不了，还来得及，加快脚步！
ううん、それなら気付かないはずがない。まだ間に合う、急がないと！
아니, 그렇다면 눈치채지 못할 리가 없어. 아직 늦지 않았어, 서둘러야 해!
No, there's no way I wouldn't notice that. There's still time, I have to hurry!
No, there's no way that wouldn't have been detected, it's not too late, pick up the pace!

10574: 汇合点应该就在不远处。
合流地点はそう遠くないはず。
합류 지점은 그리 멀지 않을 거야.
The rendezvous point shouldn't be far.
The rendezvous point should be not far away.
The confluence should not be far away.
怎么突然冒出来这么多死士！
どうして急に、こんなにたくさんゾンビが出てきたの！？
왜 갑자기 이렇게 많은 좀비가 나오는 거야!?
Why are there suddenly so many zombies?!
How did so many dead soldiers suddenly appear!
Why are there suddenly so many zombies out there!
信号也变得很不稳定……某种意义上来说，算是好消息。
電波も不安定になった……なるほどね。
The signal's also become unstable... I see.
The signal has also become very erratic ...... In a sense, it's good news.
The signal has also become unstable. ...... I see.
あいつはまだ雪山にいる。
That guy is still in the snowy mountains.
That guy, still on the snowy mountain.
That guy is still in the snowy mountains.
但好消息归好消息，这临时拿来用的武器，就算做过应急处理，要打这么多也太难为人了吧！
でも、こんな一時しのぎの武器じゃ、これだけの数を相手にするのは無茶よ！
하지만 이런 임시변통 무기로는 이렇게 많은 수를 상대하는 건 무리야!
But with such a makeshift weapon, it's impossible to take on this many enemies!
But good news is good news, this temporary weapon, even if it has done emergency treatment, it is too difficult to fight so many people!
But such a makeshift weapon is useless against such a large number of people!
不行就靠拳头，靠气势，我琪亚娜什么时候怕过，来啊！
ダメなら拳と気合いで勝負よ！この私に怖いものなんてないんだから。かかってきなさい！
안 되면 주먹과 기합으로 승부야! 내게 무서울 건 없으니까. 덤벼봐!
If that doesn't work, I'll just fight with my fists and spirit! When have I ever been afraid of something like this? Bring it on!
If I can't, I'll rely on my fists, on my momentum. When have I, Kiana, ever been afraid? Come on!
If not, I'll fight with my fists and my spirit! I'm not afraid of anything. Come at me!
10575: 呼，还好，绮罗姐你怎么找到我的。
ふぅ、大丈夫。綺羅姉さん、どうやって私を見つけたの？
후, 괜찮아. 키라 언니, 어떻게 날 찾은 거야?
Whew, I'm okay. Kira, how did you find me?
Phew, it's okay. How did you find me, Erika-chan.
Huh, it's okay. Kira sister, how did you find me?
临时指挥部就在附近，你这么大动静，想听不到都难。
臨時指揮本部はこの近くなの。こんな大騒ぎを起こせば、聞こえないわけないでしょ。
임시 지휘 본부가 이 근처였거든. 이런 소동을 벌이면 들리지 않을 수 없지.
The temporary command center is nearby. If you keep making a fuss, they're sure to hear us.
The temporary command is nearby. It's hard not to hear you when you're making so much noise.
The temporary command center is just around the corner. How could they not hear us if we make such a big fuss?
怎么，碰到库库尔坎的时候还敢擅自行动，现在就服输了？
どうしたの？ククルカンに遭遇した時は勝手に行動したくせに。
왜 그래? 쿠쿨칸을 만났을 때는 혼자 마음대로 행동하더니.
What's wrong with you? You dared to act on your own when you encountered Kukulkan.
What, you had the nerve to take liberties when you ran into Kukulkan, and now you're giving in?
What's wrong with you? You acted on your own when you encountered Kukulcan.
别挖苦我了，终有一天我会成为S级女武神，如果这种对手都没法对付的话——
イジワル言わないでよ。私はいつかS級ヴァルキリーになるんだから。こんなヤツらを相手に手も足も出ないようなら——
약오르게 말하지 마. 난 언젠가 S급 발키리가 될 거야. 이런 놈들 상대로 손도 발도 못 쓰면 ——
Stop being mean. I'm going to be an S-rank Valkyrie someday. If I'm powerless against these guys...
Don't be sarcastic. One day I'll become an S-class Valkyrie. If I can't handle this kind of opponent--
Don't be naughty. I'm going to be an S-class Valkyrie someday. If I can't even get a foot in the door against these guys...
要是没处理好，让它跑到人群密集的地方，后果不用我说吧。
もしあなたが仕留めきれず、刺激されたあいつが人の密集する場所に逃げたら——どんな結果になるか言うまでもないでしょ。
네가 제대로 잡지 못하고, 자극받은 저 녀석이 사람이 많은 곳으로 도망치면 —— 어떤 결과가 나올진 말 안 해도 알겠지.
If you fail to kill him, and he becomes provoked and runs off into a populated area — you know the consequences.
I don't need to tell you the consequences if you don't handle it properly and let it run into a crowded area.
If you fail to finish him off, and he is provoked to flee to a crowded place - I don't need to tell you what the consequences will be.
先到临时指挥部整顿一下，你这样，也没法继续作战。
とりあえず臨時指揮本部で休みなさい。その状態ではこれ以上戦えないでしょ。
일단 임시 지휘 본부에서 쉬어. 그 상태론 더 이상 싸울 수 없잖아.
For now, go rest at the temporary command center. You can't fight any more in that condition.
Let's go to the temporary command headquarters and get organized. You can't continue the battle like this.
For now, go rest at the temporary command center. You can't fight any more in that condition.
今天的绮罗姐，好严厉啊。
今日の綺羅姉さんはすごく厳しいね。
Kira, your sister is very demanding today.
10576: 天空看起来和平时没什么两样，崩坏爆发也好，和巨大崩坏兽战斗也好，都像是“没什么了不起”的事一样。
空はいつもと変わらないように見える。崩壊の発生にしても、巨大崩壊獣との戦いにしても、「大したことない」ように思える。
하늘은 언제나와 다를 바 없어 보인다. 붕괴의 발생이든, 거대붕괴수와의 전투든, 「대수롭지 않은」 일처럼 느껴진다.
The sky looks the same as always. The Honkai outbreak and the battle with that giant Honkai Beast all feel like "no big deal" here.
